title: Paul Rabil, Lax's GOAT, Kicks Himself Upstairs
itunes:title: Paul Rabil, Lax's GOAT, Kicks Himself Upstairs
description:
Widely regarded as the best-known, most-influential lacrosse player in history, Paul Rabil is changing jobs, sort of. Having single-handedly pushed the sport into the mainstream since his days at Johns Hopkins, Rabil is retiring from playing to focus on running the league he and his brother created. In a wide-ranging conversation, Rabil goes deep with Jason Kelly on his career and the state of the fast-growing Premier Lacrosse League.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
